name: Leon`s Adventure
description:
Sticks started a three-state war between Cubin and Legin. Our main character must collect parts of the Balance Ring.

!!The game is under development, those versions of the game are alpha(coming soon beta)!!

!!Stay tuned for updates and development!!

Story:

Once upon a time there lived three races:Sticks,Cubin and Legin.

Something happened between them that everyone did not expect - a war began

And not the usual one, but between them all. However, there is a solution to this problem.

There was a legend about the Ring of Balance, which was able to restore harmony between peoples. However, for this to happen, you need to know all the parts. Because it was hidden securely, but time came and it split.

Gameplay:It remains a platformer, but in terms of plot, it differs from a couple of games -Sonic The Hedgehog(robot,villian-scientist,power artifacts) and Undertale(Souls,Abilities and plot).Each of the locations will have one of the Rings of Balance.

P.S:Maybe in the beta I will reveal them in more detail with abilities
